description:
Kase Ryousuke is a chef in the restaurant who had a sexual interest in http://anidb.net/ch93199 [Akira]. When he learned about Akira`s infatuation with http://anidb.net/ch93201 [Masami], he blackmailed with a date with him in order to keep her secret.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kase Ryousuke
